00016 void Translation::search(boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults> query, int search_option) const
00017 {
00018     boost::shared_ptr<VerseMatcher> verse_matcher;
00019     if ((search_option & CaseInsensitive) == CaseInsensitive)
00020     {
00021         if ((search_option & MatchWholeWord) == MatchWholeWord)
00022         {
00023             verse_matcher = boost::shared_ptr<VerseMatcher>(new CaseInsensitiveWholeWordVerseMatcher);
00024         }
00025         else
00026         {
00027             verse_matcher = boost::shared_ptr<VerseMatcher>(new CaseInsensitiveVerseMatcher);
00028         }
00029     }
00030     else
00031     {
00032         if ((search_option & MatchWholeWord) == MatchWholeWord)
00033         {
00034             verse_matcher = boost::shared_ptr<VerseMatcher>(new CaseSensitiveWholeWordVerseMatcher);
00035         }
00036         else
00037         {
00038             verse_matcher = boost::shared_ptr<VerseMatcher>(new CaseSensitiveVerseMatcher);
00039         }
00040     }
00041 
00042     SearchStringParser parser;
00043     std::vector<std::string> search_terms = parser.parse(query->get_search_string());
00044 
00045     std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator search_term = search_terms.begin();
00046 
00047     // Prime the matching verses vector by searching for the first term in the entire translation.
00048     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator begin = m_verses.begin();
00049     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator end = m_verses.end();
00050 
00051     std::vector<int> matching_verses;
00052     for (std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator verse = begin; verse != end; ++verse)
00053     {
00054         if (verse_matcher->is_match(*verse, *search_term))
00055         {
00056             matching_verses.push_back((*verse)->get_unique_id());
00057         }
00058     }
00059 
00060 
00061     // Now search only the primed results for the rest of the search terms (if any exist).
00062     for (++search_term; search_term != search_terms.end(); ++search_term)
00063     {
00064         std::vector<int> filtered_matching_verses;
00065         for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator verse_id = matching_verses.begin(); verse_id != matching_verses.end(); ++verse_id)
00066         {
00067             if (verse_matcher->is_match(m_verses[*verse_id], *search_term))
00068             {
00069                 filtered_matching_verses.push_back(*verse_id);
00070             }
00071         }
00072 
00073         matching_verses = filtered_matching_verses;
00074     }
00075 
00076     // Finally add the verses that matched all of the terms to the results.
00077     for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator verse_id = matching_verses.begin(); verse_id != matching_verses.end(); ++verse_id)
00078     {
00079         query->add_matching_verse(m_long_name, *verse_id);
00080     }
00081 }
00082 
00083 std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> > Translation::get_verse(int unique_id, int num_entries_context) const
00084 {
00085     int requested_lower_bound = unique_id - num_entries_context;
00086     int lower_bound =  requested_lower_bound >= 0 ? requested_lower_bound : 0;
00087  
00088     int last_verse_index = m_verses.size() - 1;
00089 
00090     int requested_upper_bound = unique_id + num_entries_context + 1;
00091     int upper_bound = requested_upper_bound <= last_verse_index ? requested_upper_bound : last_verse_index;
00092 
00093     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> > verses;
00094     
00095     std::copy(&m_verses[lower_bound], &m_verses[upper_bound], std::back_inserter(verses));
00096 
00097     if (unique_id == last_verse_index)
00098     {
00099         verses.push_back(m_verses[last_verse_index]);
00100     }
00101 
00102     return verses;
00103 }

00105 bool Translation::save(const std::string &filename)
00106 {
00107     TranslationBuffer buffer;
00108     buffer.set_long_name(m_long_name);
00109     buffer.set_short_name(m_short_name);
00110 
00111     for (std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator it = m_verses.begin();
00112          it != m_verses.end();
00113          ++it)
00114     {
00115         VerseBuffer* verse_buffer = buffer.add_verse();
00116         verse_buffer->set_book((*it)->get_book());
00117         verse_buffer->set_chapter((*it)->get_chapter());
00118         verse_buffer->set_verse((*it)->get_verse());
00119         verse_buffer->set_text((*it)->get_text());
00120         verse_buffer->set_unique_id((*it)->get_unique_id());
00121     }
00122 
00123     std::fstream output(filename.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::trunc | std::ios::binary);
00124     if (!buffer.SerializeToOstream(&output))
00125         return false;
00126     output.close();
00127 
00128     return true;
00129 }

00131 bool Translation::resume(const std::string &filename)
00132 {
00133     TranslationBuffer buffer;
00134 
00135     std::fstream input(filename.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00136     if (!input || !buffer.ParseFromIstream(&input)) 
00137         return false;
00138 
00139     input.close();
00140 
00141     m_long_name = buffer.long_name();
00142     m_short_name = buffer.short_name();
00143 
00144     m_verse_tree = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, 0));
00145     VerseTreeItem* cur_verse_tree_root = m_verse_tree.get();
00146     //m_verse_tree = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem("", -1));
00147 
00148     //boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> translation_item = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, 0));
00149     //m_verse_tree->add_child(translation_item, VerseTreeItem::translation);
00150     //VerseTreeItem* cur_verse_tree_root = translation_item.get();
00151 
00152     std::string cur_book;
00153     int cur_chapter = 0;
00154 
00155     int num_verses = buffer.verse_size();
00156     for (int i = 0; i < num_verses; ++i)
00157     {
00158         VerseBuffer verse_buffer = buffer.verse(i);
00159         boost::shared_ptr<Verse> verse(new Verse(verse_buffer.book(), verse_buffer.chapter(),
00160                                                  verse_buffer.verse(), verse_buffer.text(),
00161                                                  verse_buffer.unique_id()));
00162         m_verses.push_back(verse);
00163 
00164         if (cur_book == "" || cur_book != verse_buffer.book())
00165         {
00166             cur_book = verse_buffer.book();
00167             cur_chapter = 1;
00168 
00169             if (cur_verse_tree_root->get_parent() != NULL && cur_verse_tree_root->get_parent()->get_parent() != NULL)
00170                 cur_verse_tree_root = cur_verse_tree_root->get_parent()->get_parent();
00171 
00172             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> book = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00173             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(book, VerseTreeItem::book);
00174 
00175             cur_verse_tree_root = book.get();
00176 
00177             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> chapter = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00178             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(chapter, VerseTreeItem::chapter);
00179             
00180             cur_verse_tree_root = chapter.get();
00181 
00182             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00183             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(verse, VerseTreeItem::verse);
00184         }
00185         else if (cur_chapter == 0 || cur_chapter != verse_buffer.chapter())
00186         {
00187             cur_chapter++;
00188 
00189             cur_verse_tree_root = cur_verse_tree_root->get_parent();
00190 
00191             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> chapter = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00192             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(chapter, VerseTreeItem::chapter);
00193             
00194             cur_verse_tree_root = chapter.get();
00195 
00196             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00197             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(verse, VerseTreeItem::verse);
00198 
00199         }
00200         else
00201         {
00202             boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem> verse = boost::shared_ptr<VerseTreeItem>(new VerseTreeItem(m_long_name, i));
00203             cur_verse_tree_root->add_child(verse, VerseTreeItem::verse);
00204         }
00205     }
00206 
00207     return true;
00208 }

00210 bool Translation::import(const std::string& long_name, const std::string& short_name, const std::string& filename)
00211 {
00212     this->m_long_name = long_name;
00213     this->m_short_name = short_name;
00214     std::ifstream raw_text;
00215 
00216     raw_text.open(filename.c_str());
00217 
00218     std::string line;
00219     while (getline(raw_text, line))
00220     {
00221         std::vector<std::string> parts;
00222         boost::algorithm::split(parts, line, boost::algorithm::is_any_of("*"));
00223 
00224         boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> verse(new Verse(parts[1], boost::lexical_cast<int>(parts[2]),
00225                                                  boost::lexical_cast<int>(parts[3]), parts[4],
00226                                                  boost::lexical_cast<int>(parts[0])));
00227         m_verses.push_back(verse);
00228     }
00229 
00230     return true;
00231 }

00242 std::string verse_collection_to_title_and_string_wrapped(const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >& verse_collection, boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation)
00243 {
00244     std::string verse_collection_string = verse_collection_to_string(verse_collection);
00245 
00246     int line_length = 80;
00247 
00248     size_t cur_line_length = line_length;
00249     while (verse_collection_string.length() > cur_line_length)
00250     {
00251         size_t space_pos = verse_collection_string.find_last_of(" ", cur_line_length);
00252         if (space_pos != std::string::npos)
00253             verse_collection_string.replace(space_pos, 1, "\n");
00254 
00255         cur_line_length += line_length;
00256     }
00257 
00258     return verse_collection_title(verse_collection, translation) + "\n\n" + verse_collection_string;
00259 }
00260 
00261 std::string verse_collection_to_string(const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >& verse_collection)
00262 {
00263     std::string verse_string;
00264 
00265     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator it = verse_collection.begin();
00266     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator end = verse_collection.end();
00267     for (; it != end; ++it)
00268     {
00269         verse_string += (*it)->get_text();
00270         if (std::distance(it, end) != 1)
00271             verse_string += " ";
00272     }
00273 
00274     return verse_string;
00275 }
00276 
00277 std::string verse_collection_title(const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >& verse_collection, boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation)
00278 {
00279     std::string title;
00280 
00281     std::string cur_book;
00282     int cur_chapter = 0;
00283     int cur_verse = 0;
00284     int last_verse = 0;
00285 
00286     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator it = verse_collection.begin();
00287     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Verse> >::const_iterator end = verse_collection.end();
00288     for (; it != end; ++it)
00289     {
00290         if (cur_book.size() == 0)
00291         {
00292             title += (*it)->get_book() + " ";
00293             cur_book = (*it)->get_book();
00294             cur_chapter = 0;
00295         }
00296         else if (cur_book != (*it)->get_book())
00297         {
00298             title += ";";
00299             title += (*it)->get_book() + " ";
00300             cur_book = (*it)->get_book();
00301             cur_chapter = 0;
00302         }
00303         
00304         if (cur_chapter == 0)
00305         {
00306             title += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>((*it)->get_chapter()) + ":";
00307             cur_chapter = (*it)->get_chapter();
00308             cur_verse = 0;
00309         }
00310         else if (cur_chapter != (*it)->get_chapter())
00311         {
00312             if (cur_verse != last_verse)
00313             {
00314                 title += "-";
00315                 title += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(cur_verse);
00316                 last_verse = cur_verse;
00317             }
00318 
00319             title += ",";
00320             title += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>((*it)->get_chapter()) + ":";
00321             cur_chapter = (*it)->get_chapter();
00322             cur_verse = 0;
00323         }
00324 
00325         if (cur_verse == 0)
00326         {
00327             title += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>((*it)->get_verse());
00328             cur_verse = (*it)->get_verse();
00329             last_verse = cur_verse;
00330         }
00331         else if (cur_verse != (*it)->get_verse())
00332         {
00333             cur_verse = (*it)->get_verse();
00334         }
00335     }
00336 
00337     if (cur_verse != 0 && it != verse_collection.begin())
00338     {
00339         if (cur_verse != last_verse)
00340         {
00341             title += "-";
00342             title += boost::lexical_cast<std::string>((*--it)->get_verse());
00343         }
00344     }
00345 
00346     title += " (";
00347     title += translation->get_short_name();
00348     title += ")";
00349 
00350     return title;
00351 }
